item.title: projects
item.description: medoix.com https://gitlab.com/medoix/medoix-site This website you are viewing.. it is a staticaly generated website with automatic CI to generate the static conent and serve it shivv.com https://gitlab.com/medoix/shivv-site Launch Alarm https://launchalarm.com Cross platform (iOS, Android) app that lists different company rocket launch scheules and allows you to view all the latest information about rocket launches and there launch complexes and payloads. This also has a big backend API and Push Notification service that is automaticaly deployed to Docker containers into AWS Elastic Container Service allowing users to register and receive push notifications when launches are taking place.
